title: Collateral Damage
description: Free ebook download, zip file (contains PRC, MOBI, PDF & EPUB formats – 1.1MB).Novelette.No good deed ever goes unpunished.Meyal Lit has been alone on an orbital for the past six months, analysing the remote planet of Falcin V.
